entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
